```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# Starting value in March
march_value <- 100

# Drop 50% in April
april_value <- march_value * (1 - 0.5)

# Increase 50% in May
may_value <- april_value * (1 + 0.5)

# Calculate the percent change from March
percent_change <- ((may_value - march_value) / march_value) * 100

# Print results
cat("March value:", march_value, "\n")
cat("April value:", april_value, "\n")
cat("May value:", may_value, "\n")
cat("Percent change from March:", percent_change, "%\n")

```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

df <- data.frame(
  Month = c("March", "April", "May"),
  Value = c(100, 50, 75)
)

ggplot(df, aes(x = Month, y = Value, group = 1)) +
  geom_line(color = "blue", size = 1.5) +
  geom_point(color = "blue", size = 3) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 100, linetype = "dashed", color = "red") +
  geom_text(aes(label = Value), vjust = -1, color = "darkgreen") +
  labs(title = "Metric Over Time (50% Drop, then 50% Increase)",
       y = "Metric Value", x = "Month") +
  ylim(0, 120) +
  theme_minimal()


```
